selector.title: AI Agent Template Character Settings
selector.description: Select the character you want. You can edit the selected persona in the 'Rules' menu and toggle it on/off in 'General Settings'.
selector.infoTextCustomInstructions: Instructions for the selected persona will be saved in custom_instructions.md (Global Rules).
